content:
I see what you mean! Integrating the new tops into my existing categories makes sense, as it will help me see how they fit into my overall wardrobe and make it easier to create new outfits.

I love your suggestion to sort the new tops by color or pattern within each group. That will definitely help me identify which ones complement or clash with my existing pieces. And leaving some space between each item is a great tip to avoid overcrowding and make it easier to grab what I need.

I'm excited to get started on organizing my new tops and seeing how they fit into my existing wardrobe. Who knows, I might discover some new favorite combinations!

Thanks for your help and guidance. You've given me the confidence to tackle my closet organization project and make the most of my new thrift store finds.
